dcterms:creator: Zhen Yang
Yingxue Zhang
Ernan Li
Fandong Meng
Jie Zhou
dcterms:description: WeTS is a benchmark dataset for translation suggestion, where each sample consists of a source sentence, a masked machine translation sentence, and a golden reference corresponding to the masked span. The masked spans with potential translation errors are selected and annotated by humans, focusing on under (over)-translations, grammatical or syntactic errors, and semantic errors.
dcterms:title: WeTS

dcterms:creator: Zhen Yang
Fandong Meng
Yingxue Zhang
Ernan Li
Jie Zhou
dcterms:description: WMT 2022 Translation Suggestion is a dataset used in the WMT 2022 shared task, which focuses on translation suggestion. It includes samples where human translators select spans with incorrect words or phrases in machine translation outputs, and the task is to provide alternatives for these spans.
dcterms:title: WMT 2022 Translation Suggestion
